20110115030105.000|20110115030113.000|CC1|DIRECT CONTACT WITH THE INMATES.
20110115030113.000|20110115030113.000|CC1|>> IT DOESN'T MATTER HOW MUCH   
20110115030113.000|20110115030114.000|CC1|STAFF WE HAVE.                  
20110115030114.000|20110115030115.000|CC1|THEY WILL ERUPT IF IT'S GOING   
20110115030115.000|20110115030122.000|CC1|TO.                             
20110115030122.000|20110115030125.000|CC1|>> MENTALITY OF MOST INMATES,   
20110115030125.000|20110115030126.000|CC1|HAVE ISSUES, I'M ON DEATH ROW,  
20110115030126.000|20110115030127.000|CC1|AND THERE'S NOTHING YOU CAN DO  
20110115030127.000|20110115030128.000|CC1|TO ME.                          
20110115030128.000|20110115030129.000|CC1|IF I ASSAULT YOU TODAY, THERE'S 
20110115030129.000|20110115030130.000|CC1|NOTHING THEY'LL DO TO ME

20110115030132.000|20110115030133.000|CC1|THAT'S THEIR MENTALITY, YOU CAN 
20110115030133.000|20110115030141.000|CC1|ONLY KILL ME ONCE.              
20110115030141.000|20110115030143.000|CC1|>> SAN QUENTIN PRISON IN        
20110115030143.000|20110115030146.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA IS HOME TO SOME      
20110115030146.000|20110115030147.000|CC1|NOTORIOUS KILLERS -- SCOTT      
20110115030147.000|20110115030148.000|CC1|PETERSON, WHO WAS SENTENCED TO  
20110115030148.000|20110115030149.000|CC1|DIE FOR MURDERING HIS PREGNANT  
20110115030149.000|20110115030150.000|CC1|WIFE, LACI, IS PERHAPS THE BEST 
20110115030150.000|20110115030152.000|CC1|KNOWN.                          
20110115030152.000|20110115030153.000|CC1|BUT THE FACILITY ALSO HOUSES    
20110115030153.000|20110115030155.000|CC1|RICHARD RAMIREZ, BETTER KNOWN AS
20110115030155.000|20110115030158.000|CC1|THE NIGHT STALKER, AND RICHARD  
20110115030158.000|20110115030159.000|CC1|ALLEN DAVIS, POLLY KLAAS'       
20110115030159.000|20110115030159.000|CC1|KILLER.                         
20110115030159.000|20110115030201.000|CC1|THE PRISON IS MORE THAN 150     
20110115030201.000|20110115030202.000|CC1|YEARS OLD.                      
20110115030202.000|20110115030205.000|CC1|THE WALLS ARE CRUMBLING.        
20110115030205.000|20110115030206.000|CC1|AND THE INSTITUTION IS OUTDATED,
20110115030206.000|20110115030208.000|CC1|CONTRIBUTING TO AN OVERWHELMING 
20110115030208.000|20110115030209.000|CC1|INCREASE IN BOTH THE NUMBER AND 
20110115030209.000|20110115030211.000|CC1|SEVERITY OF BRUTAL ASSAULTS BY  
20110115030211.000|20110115030212.000|CC1|INMATES.                        
20110115030212.000|20110115030214.000|CC1|DURING THE NEXT HOUR, YOU WILL  
20110115030214.000|20110115030215.000|CC1|WITNESS LIFE INSIDE SAN QUENTIN,
20110115030215.000|20110115030216.000|CC1|INCLUDING A LOOK INSIDE         
20110115030216.000|20110115030223.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA'S VICIOUS DEATH ROW. 
20110115030223.000|20110115030226.000|CC1|>> SAN QUENTIN OPENED IN 1852   
20110115030226.000|20110115030227.000|CC1|AND TODAY, SEEMS PHYSICALLY     
20110115030227.000|20110115030229.000|CC1|TRAPPED IN THE CENTURY IN WHICH 
20110115030229.000|20110115030237.000|CC1|IT WAS CONCEIVED.               
20110115030237.000|20110115030238.000|CC1|OLD AND DECREPIT, SAN QUENTIN IS
20110115030238.000|20110115030241.000|CC1|RIDDLED WITH SHADOWY ALCOVES AND
20110115030241.000|20110115030247.000|CC1|BLIND SPOTS.                    
20110115030247.000|20110115030249.000|CC1|THERE ARE NO ELECTRIFIED, LETHAL
20110115030249.000|20110115030252.000|CC1|FENCES.                         
20110115030252.000|20110115030253.000|CC1|THE TOWERS AROUND THE PERIMETER 
20110115030253.000|20110115030255.000|CC1|MUST STILL BE STAFFED WHERE,    
20110115030255.000|20110115030256.000|CC1|INCREDIBLY, THERE ARE FEWER     
20110115030256.000|20110115030257.000|CC1|SURVEILLANCE CAMERAS THAN A     
20110115030257.000|20110115030300.000|CC1|SINGLE CONVENIENCE STORE.       
20110115030300.000|20110115030302.000|CC1|AND WORSE YET, A LACK OF        
20110115030302.000|20110115030304.000|CC1|MODERNIZATION HAS PUT OFFICERS  
20110115030304.000|20110115030305.000|CC1|IN CONSTANT RISK OF INMATE      
20110115030305.000|20110115030308.000|CC1|ATTACK.                         
20110115030308.000|20110115030310.000|CC1|>> EVERY DAY I WALK THROUGH     
20110115030310.000|20110115030311.000|CC1|THOSE GATES, THE THOUGHT CROSSES
20110115030311.000|20110115030312.000|CC1|MY MIND.                        
20110115030312.000|20110115030317.000|CC1|IS TODAY GOING TO BE THE LAST?  
20110115030317.000|20110115030321.000|CC1|>> THE GROUNDS ARE A SPRAWLING  
20110115030321.000|20110115030322.000|CC1|432 ACRES LOCATED ON THE SHORES 
20110115030322.000|20110115030327.000|CC1|OF BEAUTIFUL SAN FRANCISCO BAY. 
20110115030327.000|20110115030329.000|CC1|>> CUSTOMERS!                   
20110115030329.000|20110115030331.000|CC1|THIS IS THE RECEIVING AND       
20110115030331.000|20110115030332.000|CC1|RELEASE AREA OF SAN QUENTIN

20110115030335.000|20110115030336.000|CC1|EXITS SAN QUENTIN WILL COME

20110115030343.000|20110115030344.000|CC1|THIS AREA.

20110115030347.000|20110115030348.000|CC1|>> WHEN INMATES FIRST ARRIVE,   
20110115030348.000|20110115030350.000|CC1|THEY ARE STRIP-SEARCHED.        
20110115030350.000|20110115030351.000|CC1|>> SPREAD YOUR CHEEKS.          
20110115030351.000|20110115030355.000|CC1|MOVE ON.                        
20110115030355.000|20110115030358.000|CC1|>> THEY GET THEIR HAIR CUT.     
20110115030358.000|20110115030359.000|CC1|THEN THEY'RE PHOTOGRAPHED AND   
20110115030359.000|20110115030402.000|CC1|FINGERPRINTED.

20110115030408.000|20110115030409.000|CC1|FINGERS ACROSS THE SCANNER.     
20110115030409.000|20110115030410.000|CC1|>> EATING.

20110115030411.000|20110115030412.000|CC1|CONFRONTATIONS LATER, EVERY

20110115030417.000|20110115030418.000|CC1|INSIDE THE PENAL SYSTEM.        
20110115030418.000|20110115030420.000|CC1|>> ENEMIES?                     
20110115030420.000|20110115030421.000|CC1|>> NONE.

20110115030430.000|20110115030430.000|CC1|>> OKAY.

20110115030432.000|20110115030433.000|CC1|>> I WISH WE COULD MAKE THAT

20110115030435.000|20110115030436.000|CC1|THE HOUSE.                      
20110115030436.000|20110115030438.000|CC1|THANK YOU.                      
20110115030438.000|20110115030439.000|CC1|>> FLORES.                      
20110115030439.000|20110115030441.000|CC1|>> ONCE EVALUATED THE NEWCOMERS 
20110115030441.000|20110115030442.000|CC1|ARE PLACED IN ONE OF SAN        
20110115030442.000|20110115030448.000|CC1|QUENTIN'S FOUR CELL BLOCKS.     
20110115030448.000|20110115030449.000|CC1|EACH CELL BLOCK HOLDS UP TO 800 
20110115030449.000|20110115030452.000|CC1|INMATES IN CELLS THAT ARE       
20110115030452.000|20110115030506.000|CC1|STACKED ON TIERS FIVE HIGH.     
20110115030506.000|20110115030507.000|CC1|AT ITS BEST, THIS IS AN         
20110115030507.000|20110115030509.000|CC1|INEFFICIENT DESIGN.             
20110115030509.000|20110115030510.000|CC1|OFFICERS ARE ALWAYS HAVING TO   
20110115030510.000|20110115030513.000|CC1|CLIMB STAIRS.                   
20110115030513.000|20110115030515.000|CC1|>> WHERE ARE THE ELEVATORS?     
20110115030515.000|20110115030516.000|CC1|>> WE'RE THE ELEVATORS.         
20110115030516.000|20110115030517.000|CC1|A HUMAN ELEVATOR.               
20110115030517.000|20110115030519.000|CC1|>> BUT AT ITS WORST, THE DESIGN 
20110115030519.000|20110115030520.000|CC1|OF SAN QUENTIN'S CELL BLOCKS    
20110115030520.000|20110115030522.000|CC1|EXPOSE OFFICERS TO INMATE       
20110115030522.000|20110115030524.000|CC1|ASSAULT.                        
20110115030524.000|20110115030525.000|CC1|>> WITH THE AGE OF THE BUILDING,
20110115030525.000|20110115030526.000|CC1|THE WAY IT'S SET UP, ALMOST     
20110115030526.000|20110115030528.000|CC1|ANYTHING YOU DO, YOU'RE IN      
20110115030528.000|20110115030531.000|CC1|DIRECT CONTACT WITH THE INMATES.
20110115030531.000|20110115030532.000|CC1|>> HEY HOW ARE YOU DOING?       
20110115030532.000|20110115030533.000|CC1|>> WHEN IT'S TIME FOR THE       
20110115030533.000|20110115030534.000|CC1|INMATES TO GO TO THE SHOWERS OR 
20110115030534.000|20110115030535.000|CC1|THE DINING HALL, AN ENTIRE TIER 
20110115030535.000|20110115030537.000|CC1|IS RELEASED SIMULTANEOUSLY.     
20110115030537.000|20110115030539.000|CC1|AND ASTONISHINGLY ONLY TWO      
20110115030539.000|20110115030542.000|CC1|OFFICERS ARE ASSIGNED TO        
20110115030542.000|20110115030543.000|CC1|ORCHESTRATE IT.                 
20110115030543.000|20110115030544.000|CC1|>> FIFTH TIER IS GOING DOWN     
20110115030544.000|20110115030546.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW.                      
20110115030546.000|20110115030548.000|CC1|>> JUST NOW, THE FOURTH TIER.   
20110115030548.000|20110115030550.000|CC1|YOU'LL BE NEXT, FIVE MINUTES.   
20110115030550.000|20110115030551.000|CC1|>> THE FRONT BAR --             
20110115030551.000|20110115030554.000|CC1|>> AN OFFICER USES AN ORIGINAL, 
20110115030554.000|20110115030556.000|CC1|ANTIQUATED KEY CALLED A SPIKE TO
20110115030556.000|20110115030559.000|CC1|UNLOCK EACH CELL DOOR, ONE BY   
20110115030559.000|20110115030600.000|CC1|ONE.                            
20110115030600.000|20110115030602.000|CC1|ONLY THEN CAN THE DOORS ON THAT 
20110115030602.000|20110115030604.000|CC1|TIER BE RELEASED WITH THE PUSH  
20110115030604.000|20110115030614.000|CC1|OF A MECHANICAL BAR.            
20110115030614.000|20110115030615.000|CC1|WITH SO MANY INMATES AND SO FEW 
20110115030615.000|20110115030616.000|CC1|OFFICERS, THE OPPORTUNITY FOR   
20110115030616.000|20110115030626.000|CC1|VIOLENCE LOOMS LARGE.           
20110115030626.000|20110115030628.000|CC1|THE ONLY VISIBLE DETERRENT IS   
20110115030628.000|20110115030630.000|CC1|THE LONE ARMED OFFICER WHO      
20110115030630.000|20110115030631.000|CC1|CONSTANTLY PATROLS THE GUN RAIL 
20110115030631.000|20110115030634.000|CC1|WHICH OVERLOOKS THE TIERS.      
20110115030634.000|20110115030636.000|CC1|>> MY JOB IS TO WALK AROUND,    
20110115030636.000|20110115030639.000|CC1|GIVE COVERAGE TO THE OTHER      
20110115030639.000|20110115030640.000|CC1|OFFICERS, WATCH THE INMATES     
20110115030640.000|20110115030641.000|CC1|MOVEMENT.                       
20110115030641.000|20110115030643.000|CC1|MAKE SURE THERE'S NO FIGHTS,    
20110115030643.000|20110115030644.000|CC1|NOTHING GOING ON IN THE CELLS.  
20110115030644.000|20110115030645.000|CC1|OF COURSE, YOU LOOK FOR         
20110115030645.000|20110115030647.000|CC1|DIFFERENT THINGS LIKE WEAPONS,  
20110115030647.000|20110115030655.000|CC1|VISIBLE THINGS.                 
20110115030655.000|20110115030657.000|CC1|>> BY CONTRAST, CONTEMPORARY    
20110115030657.000|20110115030701.000|CC1|PRISONS CONTROL INMATE MOVEMENT 
20110115030701.000|20110115030703.000|CC1|SAFELY AND REMOTELY WITH THE USE
20110115030703.000|20110115030703.000|CC1|OF ELECTRONIC DOORS.            
20110115030703.000|20110115030705.000|CC1|AT SAN QUENTIN, OFFICERS MUST   
20110115030705.000|20110115030706.000|CC1|ESCORT INMATES EVERYWHERE.      
20110115030706.000|20110115030711.000|CC1|TO THE SHOWERS.                 
20110115030711.000|20110115030711.000|CC1|TO THE LAUNDRY.                 
20110115030711.000|20110115030714.000|CC1|EVERYWHERE.                     
20110115030714.000|20110115030717.000|CC1|AND IF AN INMATE IS MORE        
20110115030717.000|20110115030718.000|CC1|VIOLENT-PRONE, IT TAKES THREE   
20110115030718.000|20110115030719.000|CC1|ESCORT OFFICERS, ALL IN FULL

20110115030750.000|20110115030752.000|CC1|     OF MY PROUDEST MOMENTS.    
20110115030752.000|20110115030754.000|CC1|  I GRADUATED FROM WEST POINT,  
20110115030754.000|20110115030754.000|CC1|    THEN I DID A TOUR OF DUTY   
20110115030754.000|20110115030755.000|CC1|            IN IRAQ.

20110115030755.000|20110115030757.000|CC1|        FROM ACTIVE DUTY,

20110115030800.000|20110115030800.000|CC1|       IT WAS KIND OF LIKE

20110115030804.000|20110115030804.000|CC1|     BUT WALMART TURNED OUT

20110115030836.000|20110115030837.000|CC1|>> ( engine revs )              
20110115030837.000|20110115030839.000|CC1|>> GOOD MORNING, ILLUMINATION.  
20110115030839.000|20110115030841.000|CC1| GOOD MORNING, INNOVATION.      
20110115030841.000|20110115030842.000|CC1| GOOD MORNING,                  
20110115030842.000|20110115030846.000|CC1| UNEQUALED INSPIRATION.         
20110115030846.000|20110115031101.000|CC1|>> ( heartbeats )               
20110115031101.000|20110115032019.000|SEG_01|Type=Story start
20110115031101.000|20110115032019.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110115031101.000|20110115031103.000|CC1|>>> THE FEEDING OF INMATES      
20110115031103.000|20110115031104.000|CC1|ALWAYS POSES ONE OF THE GREATEST
20110115031104.000|20110115031106.000|CC1|RISKS FOR VIOLENCE AT SAN       
20110115031106.000|20110115031107.000|CC1|QUENTIN.                        
20110115031107.000|20110115031109.000|CC1|SAN QUENTIN'S LACK OF           
20110115031109.000|20110115031110.000|CC1|MODERNIZATION PLACES INMATES    
20110115031110.000|20110115031112.000|CC1|WITHIN STRIKING DISTANCE OF     
20110115031112.000|20110115031115.000|CC1|OFFICERS AND OTHER INMATES.     
20110115031115.000|20110115031117.000|CC1|AMONG THE 6,000 INMATES AT SAN  
20110115031117.000|20110115031119.000|CC1|QUENTIN, MORE THAN 3,000 GENERAL
20110115031119.000|20110115031122.000|CC1|POPULATION INMATES EAT THEIR    
20110115031122.000|20110115031123.000|CC1|MEALS IN THE DINING HALL.       
20110115031123.000|20110115031126.000|CC1|ONLY A HANDFUL OF OFFICERS      
20110115031126.000|20110115031128.000|CC1|OVERSEE THE PROCESS.            
20110115031128.000|20110115031129.000|CC1|>> ON MOST NIGHTS THERE WILL BE 
20110115031129.000|20110115031130.000|CC1|TWO OFFICERS IN THE DINING HALL.
20110115031130.000|20110115031132.000|CC1|THERE WILL BE ANYWHERE FROM LIKE
20110115031132.000|20110115031133.000|CC1|200 TO 400 INMATES IN THE DINING
20110115031133.000|20110115031134.000|CC1|HALL.                           
20110115031134.000|20110115031135.000|CC1|AND THERE'S NO GUNS IN ANY      
20110115031135.000|20110115031137.000|CC1|DINING HALL.                    
20110115031137.000|20110115031138.000|CC1|AND ALL WE HAVE IS OUR PEPPER   
20110115031138.000|20110115031141.000|CC1|SPRAY AND BATON AND OUR         
20110115031141.000|20110115031144.000|CC1|COMMUNICATIONS SKILLS.          
20110115031144.000|20110115031149.000|CC1|>> THIS IS KNOWN AS MARK 46.    
20110115031149.000|20110115031151.000|CC1|IT SPRAYS OC PEPPER SPRAY.      
20110115031151.000|20110115031153.000|CC1|CONTROLS ANY KIND OF DISTURBANCE
20110115031153.000|20110115031155.000|CC1|WE MAY HAVE DURING FEEDING,     
20110115031155.000|20110115031155.000|CC1|AFTER FEEDING, DURING ESCORT,   
20110115031155.000|20110115031157.000|CC1|INMATES COMING IN AND OUT OF THE
20110115031157.000|20110115031203.000|CC1|DINING HALL.                    
20110115031203.000|20110115031205.000|CC1|>> ON THIS DAY, PRISON          
20110115031205.000|20110115031206.000|CC1|INTELLIGENCE HAS WARNED OFFICERS
20110115031206.000|20110115031207.000|CC1|THAT A GANG-RELATED ATTACK MIGHT
20110115031207.000|20110115031208.000|CC1|OCCUR AT DINNER.                
20110115031208.000|20110115031210.000|CC1|>> TONIGHT, WE'RE EXPECTING SOME
20110115031210.000|20110115031211.000|CC1|TYPE OF PROBLEMS.               
20110115031211.000|20110115031213.000|CC1|POSSIBLY.                       
20110115031213.000|20110115031216.000|CC1|SO WE HAVE SOME EXTRA COVERAGE  
20110115031216.000|20110115031223.000|CC1|TONIGHT TO PROVIDE SECURITY.    
20110115031223.000|20110115031231.000|CC1|>> A MEMBER OF A GANG CALLED    
20110115031231.000|20110115031237.000|CC1|NUESTRA FAMILIA IS IN RISK OF   
20110115031237.000|20110115031238.000|CC1|REPRIMAND FOR NOT FULFILLING A  
20110115031238.000|20110115031238.000|CC1|DIRECT ORDER.                   
20110115031238.000|20110115031239.000|CC1|>> THEY ASKED THEM TO           
20110115031239.000|20110115031240.000|CC1|PARTICIPATE IN THEIR GANG.      
20110115031240.000|20110115031241.000|CC1|IF THEY REFUSE, THEY ARE        
20110115031241.000|20110115031242.000|CC1|DISCIPLINED.                    
20110115031242.000|20110115031242.000|CC1|AND THE DISCIPLINE BEING        
20110115031242.000|20110115031243.000|CC1|SLASHED.                        
20110115031243.000|20110115031244.000|CC1|>> IT DOESN'T MATTER HOW MUCH   
20110115031244.000|20110115031245.000|CC1|STAFF WE HAVE.                  
20110115031245.000|20110115031246.000|CC1|THEY WILL ERUPT IF IT'S GOING   
20110115031246.000|20110115031246.000|CC1|TO.                             
20110115031246.000|20110115031249.000|CC1|>> OFFICERS ARE TENSE, WATCHING 
20110115031249.000|20110115031251.000|CC1|FOR ANY SIGNS OF TROUBLE.       
20110115031251.000|20110115031259.000|CC1|PEPPER SPRAY IS AT THE READY.   
20110115031259.000|20110115031301.000|CC1|[ ALARM BUZZING ]               
20110115031301.000|20110115031305.000|CC1|>> GET ON THE FLOOR!            
20110115031305.000|20110115031307.000|CC1|>> SURE ENOUGH, THE ALARM       
20110115031307.000|20110115031314.000|CC1|SOUNDS.                         
20110115031314.000|20110115031316.000|CC1|PRISON WIDE, INMATES SIT DOWN   
20110115031316.000|20110115031321.000|CC1|ACCORDING TO PROTOCOL.          
20110115031321.000|20110115031323.000|CC1|OFFICERS CATCH A MAN ATTEMPTING 
20110115031323.000|20110115031325.000|CC1|TO CONCEAL HIS HOMEMADE SLASHING
20110115031325.000|20110115031327.000|CC1|WEAPON.                         
20110115031327.000|20110115031328.000|CC1|FORTUNATELY, A VIOLENT ACT WAS  
20110115031328.000|20110115031331.000|CC1|AVOIDED THIS TIME.              
20110115031331.000|20110115031334.000|CC1|>> ALL RIGHT.                   
20110115031334.000|20110115031335.000|CC1|IT'S OKAY.                      
20110115031335.000|20110115031336.000|CC1|>> IN THIS CELL BLOCK IT'S THE  
20110115031336.000|20110115031338.000|CC1|OFFICER WHO IS AT RISK DURING   
20110115031338.000|20110115031339.000|CC1|MEAL TIME.                      
20110115031339.000|20110115031340.000|CC1|INMATES HOUSED HERE ARE         
20110115031340.000|20110115031341.000|CC1|CONSIDERED TOO VIOLENT TO BE    
20110115031341.000|20110115031343.000|CC1|PERMITTED TO LEAVE THEIR CELLS. 
20110115031343.000|20110115031345.000|CC1|SO IT'S THE OFFICERS WHO MUST   
20110115031345.000|20110115031353.000|CC1|DELIVER THE FOOD CELL BY CELL.  
20110115031353.000|20110115031354.000|CC1|>> THIS IS ONE OF THE MOST      
20110115031354.000|20110115031355.000|CC1|DANGEROUS AREAS IN THE          
20110115031355.000|20110115031357.000|CC1|INSTITUTION.                    
20110115031357.000|20110115031359.000|CC1|THERE'S THAT PRESENCE OF A CLEAR
20110115031359.000|20110115031400.000|CC1|AND PRESENT DANGER AS SOON AS   
20110115031400.000|20110115031401.000|CC1|YOU STEP ON THE TIER.           
20110115031401.000|20110115031402.000|CC1|AND IT DOESN'T GO AWAY.         
20110115031402.000|20110115031406.000|CC1|>> OFFICER TONY JONES HAS WORKED
20110115031406.000|20110115031407.000|CC1|THESE TIERS FOR 14 YEARS AND HE 
20110115031407.000|20110115031408.000|CC1|KNOWS WHAT INMATES HERE ARE     
20110115031408.000|20110115031412.000|CC1|CAPABLE OF.                     
20110115031412.000|20110115031414.000|CC1|>> THEY DON'T WORK AND PLAY WELL
20110115031414.000|20110115031414.000|CC1|WITH OTHERS.                    
20110115031414.000|20110115031416.000|CC1|THEY'RE THE BAD GUYS HERE AT SAN
20110115031416.000|20110115031418.000|CC1|QUENTIN.                        
20110115031418.000|20110115031420.000|CC1|>> A MODERN PRISON WOULD HAVE   
20110115031420.000|20110115031423.000|CC1|SOLID DOORS TO PROTECT OFFICERS 
20110115031423.000|20110115031424.000|CC1|DURING FEEDING.                 
20110115031424.000|20110115031425.000|CC1|BUT HERE, THE CELL FRONTS ARE   
20110115031425.000|20110115031426.000|CC1|OPEN, ALLOWING INMATES THE      
20110115031426.000|20110115031428.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITY TO ASSAULT OFFICERS 
20110115031428.000|20110115031430.000|CC1|IN, PERHAPS, THE MOST UNSAVORY  
20110115031430.000|20110115031433.000|CC1|WAY POSSIBLE.                   
20110115031433.000|20110115031435.000|CC1|>> THE ABSOLUTE WORST THING THAT
20110115031435.000|20110115031436.000|CC1|COULD HAPPEN TO YOU IS TO HAVE  
20110115031436.000|20110115031437.000|CC1|THAT GASSING, IS WHAT WE CALL   
20110115031437.000|20110115031439.000|CC1|IT, THAT MIXTURE OF FECES AND   
20110115031439.000|20110115031442.000|CC1|URINE, SOMETIMES FERMENTED FOR  
20110115031442.000|20110115031443.000|CC1|DAYS UNTIL IT STEWS INTO        
20110115031443.000|20110115031444.000|CC1|SOMETHING SO GROTESQUE YOU CAN'T
20110115031444.000|20110115031446.000|CC1|MENTION IT.                     
20110115031446.000|20110115031448.000|CC1|AND THAT IS THROWN ON THE       
20110115031448.000|20110115031449.000|CC1|OFFICER THROUGH THE BARS.       
20110115031449.000|20110115031453.000|CC1|A LOT OF THESE GUYS ARE INFECTED
20110115031453.000|20110115031454.000|CC1|WITH HEPATITIS "C," HIV, AND    
20110115031454.000|20110115031455.000|CC1|MANY OTHER DISEASES.            
20110115031455.000|20110115031456.000|CC1|I'D RATHER BE PUNCHED.          
20110115031456.000|20110115031500.000|CC1|I'D RATHER BE KICKED.           
20110115031500.000|20110115031501.000|CC1|I'D RATHER BE STABBED THAN TO BE
20110115031501.000|20110115031508.000|CC1|GASSED LIKE I WAS BACK IN '92.  
20110115031508.000|20110115031510.000|CC1|>> INCREDIBLE AS IT MAY SEEM,   
20110115031510.000|20110115031513.000|CC1|OFFICERS AT SAN QUENTIN SAY THAT
20110115031513.000|20110115031515.000|CC1|THERE'S AN ATTEMPTED ASSAULT ON 
20110115031515.000|20110115031516.000|CC1|THEIR LIVES ALMOST EVERY DAY.   
20110115031516.000|20110115031517.000|CC1|>> THEY LOOK FOR VULNERABLE     
20110115031517.000|20110115031518.000|CC1|SPOTS.                          
20110115031518.000|20110115031519.000|CC1|THEY LOOK FOR TIMES WHEN YOU DO 
20110115031519.000|20110115031522.000|CC1|LET YOUR GUARD DOWN.            
20110115031522.000|20110115031525.000|CC1|>> THIS IS DEATH ROW.           
20110115031525.000|20110115031528.000|CC1|IN FACT, THIS IS CALIFORNIA'S   
20110115031528.000|20110115031529.000|CC1|ONLY MALE DEATH ROW WHERE THE   
20110115031529.000|20110115031530.000|CC1|METHOD OF EXECUTION IS LETHAL   
20110115031530.000|20110115031536.000|CC1|INJECTION.                      
20110115031536.000|20110115031537.000|CC1|THIS IS WHERE YOU'LL FIND SUCH  
20110115031537.000|20110115031538.000|CC1|VICIOUS KILLERS AS RICHARD      
20110115031538.000|20110115031540.000|CC1|RAMIREZ, THE SO-CALLED NIGHT    
20110115031540.000|20110115031542.000|CC1|STALKER, AND RICHARD ALLEN      
20110115031542.000|20110115031543.000|CC1|DAVIS, THE KILLER OF POLLY      
20110115031543.000|20110115031545.000|CC1|KLAAS.                          
20110115031545.000|20110115031547.000|CC1|TODAY, THE CONDEMNED POPULATION 
20110115031547.000|20110115031550.000|CC1|HAS GROWN TO A STAGGERING 581,  
20110115031550.000|20110115031552.000|CC1|WELL BEYOND SAN QUENTIN'S       
20110115031552.000|20110115031555.000|CC1|ABILITY TO HANDLE THEM.         
20110115031555.000|20110115031557.000|CC1|THIS FORCED DEATH ROW TO EXPAND 
20110115031557.000|20110115031558.000|CC1|INTO THREE ADDITIONAL CELL      
20110115031558.000|20110115031600.000|CC1|BLOCKS, NEVER DESIGNED FOR SUCH 
20110115031600.000|20110115031602.000|CC1|VIOLENT INMATES.                
20110115031602.000|20110115031604.000|CC1|>> OKAY.                        
20110115031604.000|20110115031605.000|CC1|WE HAVE ONE ESCORT COMING       
20110115031605.000|20110115031606.000|CC1|THROUGH.                        
20110115031606.000|20110115031608.000|CC1|>> HAVING WORKED AT SAN QUENTIN 
20110115031608.000|20110115031610.000|CC1|FOR 25 YEARS, WARDEN JEANNE     
20110115031610.000|20110115031611.000|CC1|WOODFORD UNDERSTANDS THE        
20110115031611.000|20110115031612.000|CC1|CHALLENGES THAT CONFRONT DEATH  
20110115031612.000|20110115031615.000|CC1|ROW.                            
20110115031615.000|20110115031617.000|CC1|>> AS THE NUMBER OF CONDEMNED   
20110115031617.000|20110115031618.000|CC1|COME IN, IT'S JUST CREATED A    
20110115031618.000|20110115031620.000|CC1|SITUATION WITH THIS PHYSICAL    
20110115031620.000|20110115031621.000|CC1|PLANT, WITH THE OPEN CELL       
20110115031621.000|20110115031622.000|CC1|FRONTS, THEIR ABILITY TO        
20110115031622.000|20110115031623.000|CC1|COMMUNICATE WITH EACH OTHER AND 
20110115031623.000|20110115031625.000|CC1|PASS ON GANG INFORMATION JUST   
20110115031625.000|20110115031628.000|CC1|MAKES IT VERY DIFFICULT TO      
20110115031628.000|20110115031630.000|CC1|MANAGE THAT POPULATION.         
20110115031630.000|20110115031633.000|CC1|>> THE MOST SADISTIC DEATH ROW  
20110115031633.000|20110115031634.000|CC1|INMATES ARE ISOLATED IN THE     
20110115031634.000|20110115031636.000|CC1|ADJUSTMENT CENTER WHERE ASSAULTS
20110115031636.000|20110115031637.000|CC1|ARE ALMOST RITUAL.              
20110115031637.000|20110115031638.000|CC1|>> IN THE LAST YEAR, IT'S       
20110115031638.000|20110115031642.000|CC1|PROBABLY TRIPLED.               
20110115031642.000|20110115031643.000|CC1|AND NOT ONLY IN NUMBERS, BUT IN 
20110115031643.000|20110115031644.000|CC1|SERIOUSNESS.                    
20110115031644.000|20110115031647.000|CC1|JUST SOME VERY SERIOUS          
20110115031647.000|20110115031648.000|CC1|INCIDENTS HAVE HAPPENED HERE.   
20110115031648.000|20110115031651.000|CC1|>> IN ONE RECENT 18-MONTH       
20110115031651.000|20110115031652.000|CC1|PERIOD, 45 OF THE 85 INMATES AT 
20110115031652.000|20110115031654.000|CC1|THE ADJUSTMENT CENTER HAVE      
20110115031654.000|20110115031656.000|CC1|SUCCESSFULLY ATTACKED STAFF.    
20110115031656.000|20110115031658.000|CC1|THE NUMBER OF ATTEMPTS?         
20110115031658.000|20110115031708.000|CC1|OFF THE CHARTS.                 
20110115031708.000|20110115031711.000|CC1|>> THE MENTALITY OF MOST INMATES
20110115031711.000|20110115031712.000|CC1|IN THIS UNIT IS, I'M ON DEATH   
20110115031712.000|20110115031713.000|CC1|ROW, THERE'S NOTHING YOU CAN DO 
20110115031713.000|20110115031714.000|CC1|TO ME.                          
20110115031714.000|20110115031715.000|CC1|IF I ASSAULT YOU TODAY, THERE'S 
20110115031715.000|20110115031717.000|CC1|NOTHING THEY'LL DO TO ME        
20110115031717.000|20110115031723.000|CC1|TOMORROW.                       
20110115031723.000|20110115031723.000|CC1|THAT'S THEIR MENTALITY.         
20110115031723.000|20110115031728.000|CC1|YOU CAN ONLY KILL ME ONCE.      
20110115031728.000|20110115031729.000|CC1|>> JUST LIKE IN GENERAL         
20110115031729.000|20110115031730.000|CC1|POPULATION, ONE OF THE MOST     
20110115031730.000|20110115031732.000|CC1|VOLATILE TIMES AT THE ADJUSTMENT
20110115031732.000|20110115031733.000|CC1|CENTER IS MEAL TIME.            
20110115031733.000|20110115031734.000|CC1|>> MORNING.                     
20110115031734.000|20110115031739.000|CC1|>> MORNING.                     
20110115031739.000|20110115031741.000|CC1|>> IT'S A TYPICAL MORNING.      
20110115031741.000|20110115031745.000|CC1|CORRECTIONAL OFFICERS ARE       
20110115031745.000|20110115031746.000|CC1|ARRIVING TO START THEIR SHIFT.  
20110115031746.000|20110115031747.000|CC1|>> CAN'T HAVE BAD BREATH, YOU   
20110115031747.000|20110115031748.000|CC1|KNOW.                           
20110115031748.000|20110115031749.000|CC1|DON'T WANT AN INMATE TO GET     
20110115031749.000|20110115031750.000|CC1|UPSET.                          
20110115031750.000|20110115031753.000|CC1|>> THEY GET READY TO SERVE      
20110115031753.000|20110115031754.000|CC1|BREAKFAST TO THE DEATH ROW      
20110115031754.000|20110115031755.000|CC1|INMATES.                        
20110115031755.000|20110115031756.000|CC1|TODAY, IT'S TWO PANCAKES AND    
20110115031756.000|20110115031757.000|CC1|GRITS.                          
20110115031757.000|20110115031758.000|CC1|INMATES ALSO GET A BAGGED LUNCH 
20110115031758.000|20110115031801.000|CC1|WITH THE MEAL.                  
20110115031801.000|20110115031804.000|CC1|AT ONE TIME, IT TOOK ONLY ONE   
20110115031804.000|20110115031805.000|CC1|OFFICER TO SERVE AN INMATE A    
20110115031805.000|20110115031806.000|CC1|MEAL.                           
20110115031806.000|20110115031809.000|CC1|HE WORE VERY LITTLE PROTECTION. 
20110115031809.000|20110115031813.000|CC1|TODAY, SINCE ATTACKS ARE        
20110115031813.000|20110115031814.000|CC1|COMMONPLACE AND VICIOUS, IT     
20110115031814.000|20110115031814.000|CC1|TAKES THREE OFFICERS WEARING    
20110115031814.000|20110115031821.000|CC1|FULL RIOT GEAR.                 
20110115031821.000|20110115031823.000|CC1|>> WHEN WE FEED BREAKFAST, WE   
20110115031823.000|20110115031824.000|CC1|HAVE ALL THE FOOD IN SERVING    
20110115031824.000|20110115031824.000|CC1|CONTAINERS.                     
20110115031824.000|20110115031827.000|CC1|AND WE PUT IT ON THE TRAYS,     
20110115031827.000|20110115031830.000|CC1|SERVE IT TO THE INMATE.         
20110115031830.000|20110115031832.000|CC1|>> ANYTIME THAT YOU POP OPEN THE
20110115031832.000|20110115031833.000|CC1|FOOD PORT, YOU'RE VULNERABLE.   
20110115031833.000|20110115031834.000|CC1|THERE'S AN OPENING FOR THE      
20110115031834.000|20110115031838.000|CC1|INMATE TO ASSAULT YOU.          
20110115031838.000|20110115031839.000|CC1|OFFICERS DES MOINES BRITTENUM   
20110115031839.000|20110115031840.000|CC1|AND KEVIN WALKER, HAVE WORKED IN
20110115031840.000|20110115031841.000|CC1|DEATH ROW FOR A TOTAL OF 12     
20110115031841.000|20110115031842.000|CC1|YEARS.                          
20110115031842.000|20110115031843.000|CC1|THEY SAY THEY CAN NEVER BE TOO  
20110115031843.000|20110115031848.000|CC1|CAREFUL IN THERE.               
20110115031848.000|20110115031849.000|CC1|>> AN INMATE MAY TRY TO GRAB    
20110115031849.000|20110115031850.000|CC1|YOUR ARM, PULL IT INTO THE CELL 
20110115031850.000|20110115031852.000|CC1|SO HE CAN BREAK IT OR STAB IT   
20110115031852.000|20110115031853.000|CC1|OR, YOU KNOW, CUT IT, SLASH IT. 
20110115031853.000|20110115031857.000|CC1|>> THERE'S BEEN AN INSTANCE     
20110115031857.000|20110115031858.000|CC1|WHERE A SPEAR WAS SHOT OUT AT AN
20110115031858.000|20110115031859.000|CC1|OFFICER WHEN THE FOOD PORT WAS  
20110115031859.000|20110115031900.000|CC1|OPEN.                           
20110115031900.000|20110115031902.000|CC1|HE OPENED THE FOOD PORT, TURNED 
20110115031902.000|20110115031903.000|CC1|AND GRABBED MILK AND BREAKFAST  
20110115031903.000|20110115031906.000|CC1|ITEMS.                          
20110115031906.000|20110115031907.000|CC1|AND WHEN HE TURNED BACK AROUND  
20110115031907.000|20110115031908.000|CC1|THE INMATE HAD SOME ELASTICS SET
20110115031908.000|20110115031911.000|CC1|UP TO SHOOT OUT AN ARROW.
